name: R5-NutritionProduct-R4B-NutritionProduct
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NutritionProduct into FHIR R4B

element.display: A product used for nutritional purposes (i.e. food or supplement)

target.display: A product used for nutritional purposes
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct`

element.display: Broad product groups or categories used to classify the product, such as Legume and Legume Products, Beverages, or Beef Products

target.display: A category or class of the nutrition product (halal, kosher, gluten free, vegan, etc)
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.category` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.category`

element.display: Specifies descriptive properties of the nutrition product
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Code specifying the type of characteristic
The value of the characteristic
A code that can identify the detailed nutrients and ingredients in a specific food product

target.display: A code designating a specific type of nutritional product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.code`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.implicitRules`

element.display: Ingredients contained in this product

target.display: Ingredients contained in this product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient`

element.display: The amount of ingredient that is in the product

target.display: The amount of ingredient that is in the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.amount` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 `amount` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `amount`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.id`

element.display: The ingredient contained in the product

target.display: The ingredient contained in the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.item` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: One or several physical instances or occurrences of the nutrition product

target.display: One or several physical instances or occurrences of the nutrition product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance` - instance changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: An identifier that supports traceability to the event during which material in this product from one or more biological entities was obtained or pooled
The expiry date or date and time for the product

target.display: The expiry date or date and time for the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.expiry` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.expiry`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.id`

element.display: The identifier for the physical instance, typically a serial number or manufacturer number

target.display: The identifier for the physical instance, typically a serial number
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.identifier`

element.display: The identification of the batch or lot of the product

target.display: The identification of the batch or lot of the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.lotNumber`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The name for the specific product
The amount of items or instances

target.display: The amount of items or instances
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.quantity`

element.display: The date until which the product is expected to be good for consumption

target.display: The date until which the product is expected to be good for consumption
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.useBy` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.useBy`

element.display: Known or suspected allergens that are a part of this product

target.display: Known or suspected allergens that are a part of this product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.knownAllergen` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.knownAllergen`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `NutritionProduct.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Manufacturer, representative or officially responsible for the product

target.display: Manufacturer, representative or officially responsible for the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.manufacturer`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Comments made about the product

target.display: Comments made about the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `note`

element.display: The product's nutritional information expressed by the nutrients

target.display: The product's nutritional information expressed by the nutrients
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient`

element.display: The amount of nutrient expressed in one or more units: X per pack / per serving / per dose

target.display: The amount of nutrient expressed in one or more units: X per pack / per serving / per dose
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.amount` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 `amount` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `amount`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.id`

element.display: The (relevant) nutrients in the product

target.display: The (relevant) nutrients in the product
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.item` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: active | inactive | entered-in-error

target.display: active | inactive | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/nutritionproduct-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/nutritionproduct-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `NutritionProduct.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionProduct.text`
